headline: Healthpeak Strengthens Life Science Leadership with Addition of Denis Sullivan as Managing Director of Lab Investments & San Diego Market Lead and Promotion of Mike Dorris as Head of West Coast Development & Construction
summary: DENVER, August 27, 2025--Healthpeak Properties, Inc. ("Healthpeak" or the "Company") (NYSE: DOC), a leading owner, operator, and developer of real estate for healthcare discovery and delivery, announced that Denis Sullivan is joining Healthpeak as Managing Director of Lab Investments & San Diego Market Lead and Mike Dorris has been promoted to Head of West Coast Development & Construction. These moves underscore the Company’s conviction in the life science sector and position Healthpeak to captu
